nodeList.nodeDescription:
Channel to create a beam of pure energy in the target direction. The beam deals fire and lightning damage to all enemies caught in it.


Drains 20 mana per second.

nodeList.description: Disintegrate has a chance to slow enemies caught within the beam.
nodeList.nodeDescription: +[30%] Chance to slow each second per point.

node.nodeDescription:
Channel to create a beam of pure energy in the target direction. The beam deals fire and lightning damage to all enemies caught in it.


Drains 20 mana per second.

node.description: While channeling Disintegrate you have the Lucomancy buff, which grants increased damage and reduces all mana costs, including Disintegrate's channel cost.
node.nodeDescription: [10%] increased global damage and mana regen per point while channelling.

node.description: Disintegrate has a chance to ignite enemies caught within the beam.
node.nodeDescription: +[15%] Chance to ignite per second per point.

Channel to create a beam of pure energy in the target direction. The beam deals fire and lightning damage to all enemies caught in it.


Drains 20 mana per second.

node.description: Disintegrate has a longer range.
node.nodeDescription: [12%] Increased range per point.

node.altText: 5 seconds if the target stays in the beam.
node.description: Flame energy builds up on enemies within the beam, causing an explosion that deals fire damage around them after 5 seconds of taking damage.
node.nodeDescription: Builds up flame energy on targets in the beam, causing a fire explosion around them after a duration.

node.description: Disintegrateâ€™s base lightning damage is converted to fire damage, unless you have the {Electrify} node.
node.nodeDescription: 100% of base damage converted to fire (unless you have the Electrify node, which converts it to lightning).

node.description: Disintegrate has a chance to ignite enemies caught within the beam.
node.nodeDescription: +[15%] Chance to ignite per second per point.

Drains 20 mana per second.

nodeList.description: Flame Energy builds up more quickly.
nodeList.nodeDescription: [1] Less stack[s] per point of flame energy required before explosion.

Channel to create a beam of pure energy in the target direction. The beam deals fire and lightning damage to all enemies caught in it.


Drains 20 mana per second.

nodeList.description: Disintegrate deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).
nodeList.nodeDescription: [10%] Increased beam damage per point.

node.description: You take less damage while channeling Disintegrate (multiplicative with other modifiers).
node.nodeDescription: You take [7%] less damage per point while channelling Disintegrate.

Channel to create a beam of pure energy in the target direction. The beam deals fire and lightning damage to all enemies caught in it.


Drains 20 mana per second.

nodeList.description: You gain ward each second while channeling Disintegrate.
nodeList.nodeDescription: You gain +[5] ward per point while channelling Disintegrate.

node.description: You take less damage while channeling Disintegrate (multiplicative with other modifiers).
node.nodeDescription: You take [7%] less damage per point while channelling Disintegrate.

Channel to create a beam of pure energy in the target direction. The beam deals fire and lightning damage to all enemies caught in it.


Drains 20 mana per second.

nodeList.description: You gain mana every time Disintegrate kills an enemy.
nodeList.nodeDescription: +8 mana on kill with Disintegrate.

node.description:
Disintegrate now has two beams, and each beam deals damage independently, so enemies caught in both take double damage.

Disintegrate costs more mana per second to channel, and each beam deals less damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).
node.nodeDescription:
Disintegrate has two beams. Each beam deals damage independently (so enemies caught in both take double damage).

60% Increased channel cost. 30% Reduced beam damage.

node.description: Disintegrate deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).
node.nodeDescription: [10%] Increased beam damage per point.

node.description: You take less damage while channeling Disintegrate (multiplicative with other modifiers).
node.nodeDescription: You take [7%] less damage per point while channelling Disintegrate.

Channel to create a beam of pure energy in the target direction. The beam deals fire and lightning damage to all enemies caught in it.


Drains 20 mana per second.

nodeList.altText: Shock reduces lightning resistance by 5%, increases chance to be stunned by 10%, lasts 4 seconds, and can stack up to 20 times. It has 60% reduced effect against bosses and players.
nodeList.description: Disintegrate has a chance to shock enemies caught within the beam.
nodeList.nodeDescription: +[15%] Chance to shock per second per point.

node.nodeDescription:
Channel to create a beam of pure energy in the target direction. The beam deals fire and lightning damage to all enemies caught in it.


Drains 20 mana per second.

nodeList.description: Disintegrate grants more mana while damaging enemies.
nodeList.nodeDescription: [25%] Increased mana restoration per point.

node.description: Disintegrate no longer costs mana and instead grants mana every second while damaging enemies. However it also deals less damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and applies ailments less frequently. This does not enable mana regen while channelling Disintegrate.
node.nodeDescription: 70% less beam damage, 70% less ailment application rate. Restores 10 mana per second while damaging enemies.

node.description: Disintegrateâ€™s base fire damage is converted to lightning. Consequently this damage scales with increases to lightning damage, but not increases to fire damage.
node.nodeDescription: 100% of base damage converted to lightning.

node.altText: Shock reduces lightning resistance by 5%, increases chance to be stunned by 10%, lasts 4 seconds, and can stack up to 20 times. It has 60% reduced effect against bosses and players.
node.description: Disintegrate has a chance to shock enemies caught within the beam.
node.nodeDescription: +[15%] Chance to shock per second per point.

Channel to create a beam of pure energy in the target direction. The beam deals fire and lightning damage to all enemies caught in it.


Drains 20 mana per second.

nodeList.description: Shock inflicted by Disintegrate is more effective and lasts longer.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Increases effectiveness and duration of shock by [15%] per point.

node.description: Disintegrateâ€™s base fire damage is converted to lightning. Consequently this damage scales with increases to lightning damage, but not increases to fire damage.
node.nodeDescription: 100% of base damage converted to lightning.

node.description: Disintegrate has a chance to shock enemies caught within the beam.
node.nodeDescription: +[15%] Chance to shock per second per point.

Channel to create a beam of pure energy in the target direction. The beam deals fire and lightning damage to all enemies caught in it.


Drains 20 mana per second.

nodeList.description: You have a chance each second to cast {Lightning Blast} at a nearby enemy, which expends mana equal to Lightning Blastâ€™s mana cost.
nodeList.nodeDescription: While channeling, you have a [25%] chance each second per point to hit 1 nearby enemy with Lightning Blast (Expends mana equal to Lightning Blast's cost).

node.altText: Shock reduces lightning resistance by 5%, increases chance to be stunned by 10%, lasts 4 seconds, and can stack up to 20 times. It has 60% reduced effect against bosses and players.
node.description: Disintegrate has a chance to shock enemies caught within the beam.
node.nodeDescription: +[15%] Chance to shock per second per point.

Channel to create a beam of pure energy in the target direction. The beam deals fire and lightning damage to all enemies caught in it.


Drains 20 mana per second.

nodeList.description: Disintegrate is upgraded to tier 3 after 4 seconds of channeling. Tier 3 grants double the bonuses of tier 2.
nodeList.nodeDescription: After 4 seconds channelling, upgrades the beam to tier 3, gaining double the bonuses of tier 2 (for a total of 200% increased damage and 100% increased mana drain compared to tier 1).

node.description: Disintegrate is upgraded to tier 2 after 2 seconds of channeling. Tier 2 Disintegrate deals more damage, but costs more mana to channel.
node.nodeDescription: After 2 seconds channelling, upgrades the beam to tier 2, gaining 100% increased damage and 50% increased mana drain.

nodeList.description: Disintegrate deals more damage while at Tier 2, but also causes you to take more damage while at tier 2 (both multiplicative with other modifiers), and are doubled at Tier 3.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
While at tier 2 Disintegrate deals [15%] more damage per point, while you take [5%] more damage per point.

While at tier 3 Disintegrate deals [30%] more damage per point, while you take [10%] more damage per point.

nodeList.description: Disintegrateâ€™s base fire damage is converted to lightning. Consequently this damage scales with increases to lightning damage, but not increases to fire damage.

node.altText: Shock reduces lightning resistance by 5%, increases chance to be stunned by 10%, lasts 4 seconds, and can stack up to 20 times. It has 60% reduced effect against bosses and players.

node.nodeDescription: +[15%] Chance to shock per second per point.

Channel to create a beam of pure energy in the target direction. The beam deals fire and lightning damage to all enemies caught in it.


Drains 20 mana per second.

nodeList.description: Disintegrate no longer costs mana and instead grants mana every second while damaging enemies. However it also deals less damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and applies ailments less frequently. This does not enable mana regen while channelling Disintegrate.
nodeList.nodeDescription: 70% less beam damage, 70% less ailment application rate. Restores 10 mana per second while damaging enemies.
